fields.name: dataset_name
fields.description: Name used to describe this GMNS network

fields.name: short_length
fields.description: Length unit used for lane/ROW widths and linear references for segments, locations, etc. along links

fields.name: long_length
fields.description: Length unit used for link lengths

fields.name: speed
fields.description: Units for speed. Usually long_length units per hour

fields.name: crs
fields.description: Coordinate system used for geometry data in this dataset. Preferably a string that can be accepted by pyproj (e.g., EPSG code or proj string)

fields.name: geometry_field_format
fields.description: The format used for geometry fields in the dataset. For example, `WKT` for files stored as plaintext

fields.name: version_number
fields.description: The version of the GMNS spec to which this dataset conforms

fields.name: id_type
fields.description: The type of primary key IDs for interopability (node_id, zone_id, ...). May be enforced by user, database schema, downstream software, etc. Must be either string or integer.

name: config.schema.json
description: Provides the units of measure, coordinate systems, and other metadata about a GMNS dataset. This table must contain a single row.
